channel.title: Adding Flasks
channel.description:
Ok, so I've made duplicates of all the potions and called them flasks instead, and I've made copies of all of their effects and made them for the flasks, so now both the flasks and potions work, but the trouble is the last part, making it spawn vials for potions and nothing for flasks.
[code]player.getInventory().getItems().set(slot,new Item(dosesLeft > 0 && toPot < pot.id.length ? pot.id[toPot]: 229, 1));[/code]
I don't know how to get this line of code make it spawn nothing if it's a flask.

item.title: Adding Flasks
item.dc:creator: @winK winK
item.description:
@winK wrote:

Well, idk if thats the right way to do it, but right now its replacing the pot with the last dose with a vial if drunk, i want it to simply delete the item instead of making it a vial.

Read full topic
